import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import "./invoice.css"; import { getBill } from "../BillsActions/BillsActions"; import { getClient } from "../Actions/ClientActions"; import { getOrder } from "../OrderActions/OrderActions"; class InvoiceBill extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = {}; } componentDidMount() { const { id } = this.props.match.params; const { bill } = this.props.bill; this.props.getBill(id, this.props.history); //this.props.getOrder(bill.order.id, this.props.history); } render() { const { bill } = this.props.bill; //const { client } = this.props.client; //const order = this.props.bill.order; console.log("bill", this.bill); return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ bill: state.bill, client: state.client, //order: state.order, //errors: state.errors, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getBill, getClient })(InvoiceBill);
